normalized: near future japan, dominated by demons and the presence of darkness.

with the implicit rule of 「mutual non-interference」, which had been observed between men and demons since ancient times, beginning to show open seams due to people descending down the path of heresy, and crime syndicates and corporations in which men and demons colluded maneuvering secretly, the era was starting to deteriorate into chaos.
however, the people who were trying to walk the path of righteousness weren't powerless either.
the government of the time had fought against the evil of man-demon heresy by organizing a group comprised of “ninja” who could oppose the 『demons』.
people called them “taimanin”――
the man-made island floating on tokyo bay, 「tokyo kingdom」.
it was a forgotten city.
the origins of its development dated back to more than half a century ago.
by auspice of the government of the day, construction of what should have been a second city centre floating on the water began, but―

with a proxy war between the american federation and the chinese union, which broke out halfway through development; the deterioration of public finances resulting from a so-called peninsula dispute; the

failure to attract investors; the collapse of the tokyo bay subway construction, which produced hundreds of casualties; and, furthermore, the trouble of an influx of refugees and dwellers of hell, all happening one after another―
entirely like it had been planned to happen from the start, it resulted in the suspension of all development being decided upon.
the island that had been produced by human hands was abandoned mid-project, leaving a vast site and a cluster of half-constructed buildings.
that was approximately 15 years ago.
thus, now――
tokyo kingdom, the city that had been forgotten, had left possession of the government, and undergone a form of development that hadn't originally been planned at all.
as the world's most dangerous abandoned city.
in the half-constructed metropolitan area, irregular buildings―which had been structurally altered, ignoring the law, safety and (at times) even the laws of physics―were lined up.
what resided in those places were the dwellers of darkness.
illegal immigrants, criminals, armed refugees, migrants from hell…
a paradise for humans, and those who weren't even human.
that place, where every act of immorality and desire existed, was tokyo kingdom city.
tonight, in one corner of that city of darkness, a modest party was about to begin.
high-class chandeliers illuminated a large underground room.
masked ladies and gentlemen were gathered in a banquet hall, which those extravagant lights illuminated.
they were eagerly awaiting an 『event』 the party's organizer―the ruler of this aristocratic room, which didn't seem like it was underneath a dangerous city―was going to reveal.

name: yamazaki
normalized: guests, thank you for waiting!
a cheer arose from the organizer's appearance.
what had come into view was an aging man dressed in a high-class suit.
unlike the guests, he did not wear a mask.
expressed on his face, which was covered in greasy sweat, was the big, calculated smile characteristic of men who held political power.
the man's name was yamazaki shin.
he was the ex-ruling party's ex-representative, a former finance minister who was presently at large, wanted for the crime of having leaked state secrets to foreign countries in exchange for money.

name: yamazaki
normalized: everyone!
due to a tiny mistake, i, apparently, am in a predicament.

name: yamazaki
normalized: this is due to the rash actions of the imperialists of the american federation, who secretly communicated with the government.

name: yamazaki
normalized: but, as you know, i have powerful backup from the chinese union and its allies.

name: yamazaki
normalized: in my local area, many voters desire my reinstatement, and, more importantly, i still have power!
banzai, proletariats!
yamazaki was full of confidence.
the media of the opposition had been criticizing yamazaki as 「the fallen prime minister」 every day.

but yamazaki, not concerned by something like that, was currently exchanging firm handshakes with the masked guests one by one, and the guests, who didn't mind that at all either, were responding to him.
this was a room that only permitted that sort of person to be in it.

name: yamazaki
normalized: well then, everyone, the introduction of tonight's star guest!
a hand, if you would!
yamazaki loudly declared.
pulled by several brawny-looking men, a large crucifix was brought into the banquet hall.
the second they recognized the “ornament” on the crucifix, great cheers broke out from the masked guests.
among the people who gathered here, there couldn't be anyone who did not know of her.

the one who was bound to the crucifix was so decorated by magnificent victories―including a large number of mortal combat scenarios in the chaos arena, and here, in tokyo kingdom―that one could even say she was now a legend.
the strongest taimanin――
igawa asagi.
she was fastened to the crucifixion stand―on which two parallel bars lined up at the upper and lower ends of a long, vertical wooden pole―by binding both arms and both ankles with metal shackles.

it was a crucifix, which had been used as far back as the edo period to pass judgement on people who committed extremely serious crimes like killing a lord or sneaking past a checking station, and, in particular, it was one referred to as kyoto-style.
however, if the well-informed looked, they would probably notice that the forked branch, which should have been a log in the kyoto-style, consisted of a wooden triangle.
the triangular block, which pointed sharply upward, was digging deeply into the groin of asagi's trademark ninja outfit.
of course, her ninja clothes, of a special rubber make, would never break from that.
however, because of the ninja clothing tightly clinging to her crotch, the creases of asagi's labia, not to mention the bulge of her clitoris, were clearly standing out.
asagi was not expressing one hint of shame on her face.
silently, she scowled at yamazaki, who looked up at her, and then at the guests.

who the hell had they been aimed at?
asagi et al.
, or the enhanced soldiers?
nevertheless, the murderous intent pointing towards her was genuine.

name: asagi
normalized: （enemy?!
ally?!
a little hesitation.
in that time, sakura and murasaki had leapt at the girl.

name: sakura
normalized: uryaahh!

name: murasaki
normalized: haahh!
they slashed at the girl from left and right.
it was a simultaneous attack from the pair, who possessed ability that ranked next to asagi's.
it was thought that there were no people who could evade that besides asagi.
however――

name: girl
normalized: hmph.
the girl, expressing a faint smile,
kiinn!
brilliantly evaded the pair's cutting attacks.
a sharp, shining blade appeared from the girl's arm.
furthermore――

name: girl
normalized: hah!
the hand of the girl who had fired the missiles just now appeared to quickly make a symbolic gesture.
it was the symbol of the wind!
no way?!

name: girl
normalized: wind god art!
“wind god・battle blade”
a gust of wind was created.
the air swirled violently.
it was a ninja art!
a blade of wind rushed towards sakura and murasaki.

name: murasaki
normalized: whaat?!

name: sakura
normalized: fuwaahh!
the pair jumped out of the way.
sure enough, although they avoided a direct hit, they ended up being blown away by the gust of wind that broke out around the girl.
however, the pair were not to be taken lightly, and immediately tried to take a defensive battle posture.

name: sakura
normalized: whoa, this girl's dangerous!

name: murasaki
normalized: wind god art?!
you bitch, who are you?!
sakura and murasaki were about to invoke their ninja arts simultaneously.

name: asagi
normalized: wait!
both of you!
asagi raised her voice.

name: sakura
normalized: h!

name: murasaki
normalized: asagi-sama?!
the pair's movement stopped from the sharpness of her voice.
however, asagi did not have the mental composure to see that.
her heart was ringing like an alarm bell.
no way.
surely, the person there wasn't――

name: asagi
normalized: is it you…?!
asuka!
a voice filled with an unthinkable degree of emotion for the middle of a mission.
asagi's voice was shaking.
sakura and murasaki also reacted to the name “asuka”.

name: sakura
normalized: asuka-chan?!

name: murasaki
normalized: asuka?!
that koukawa asuka?!

name: girl
normalized: fufuu.
a tiny laugh.
the girl called asuka took a fighting posture.

name: asagi
normalized: asuka?!
why are you in a place like this?!
answer me!
asagi shouted again.

name: girl
normalized: …hmm hmph.
the girl made a broad grin.
it was a dark smile, one that could be called a sneer.
wind rose up around her.

name: girl
normalized: “wind god・flight”
her body gently floated.
the girl then opened her mouth.

name: asuka
normalized: i was listening to your communication.
running away, huh?
you're still a government dog, aren't you asagi-san?

normalized: asuka-chan…

normalized: you bitch, what's the meaning of this?

normalized: is there a need to tell you that?
now, i have business with those guys, so disappear at once.

the presence of pursuers was greater than it had been just before.

name: asagi
normalized: asuka!
wait, asuka!

instantly expressing a look of scorn again, she disregarded asagi's voice of restraint, and flew in the direction of the strengthened human soldiers.

name: asagi
normalized: asuka…

that was asuka-chan!
really truly.

normalized: asagi-sama…

she didn't show it on her face, but that was the same for asagi too.

normalized: onee-chan…

down the evacuation route, in the opposite direction from asuka.
